mapper.select: SELECT CONTAINER_UUID AS containerUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, CONTAINER_NAME AS containerName, CONTAINER_TYPE_UUID AS containerTypeUuid, CONTROL_NUMBER AS controlNumber, PROVENANCE AS provenance, CREATION_START_DATE AS creationStartDate, CREATION_END_DATE AS creationEndDate, ORDER_NO AS orderNo, ORDER_KEY AS orderKey, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, USE_YN AS useYn, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM ST_CONTAINER

SELECT CONTAINER_UUID AS containerUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, CONTAINER_NAME AS containerName, CONTAINER_TYPE_UUID AS containerTypeUuid, CONTROL_NUMBER AS controlNumber, PROVENANCE AS provenance, CREATION_START_DATE AS creationStartDate, CREATION_END_DATE AS creationEndDate, ORDER_NO AS orderNo, ORDER_KEY AS orderKey, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, USE_YN AS useYn, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM ST_CONTAINER WHERE CONTAINER_UUID = #{containerUuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE ST_CONTAINER SET STATUS_UUID = #{statusUuid}, CONTAINER_NAME = #{containerName}, CONTAINER_TYPE_UUID = #{containerTypeUuid}, CONTROL_NUMBER = #{controlNumber}, PROVENANCE = #{provenance}, CREATION_START_DATE = #{creationStartDate}, CREATION_END_DATE = #{creationEndDate}, ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}, ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, NOTES = #{notes}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, INSERT_UUID = #{insertUuid}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate}, UPDATE_UUID = #{updateUuid}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE CONTAINER_UUID = #{containerUuid}

INSERT INTO ST_CONTAINER ( CONTAINER_UUID, STATUS_UUID, CONTAINER_NAME, CONTAINER_TYPE_UUID, CONTROL_NUMBER, PROVENANCE, CREATION_START_DATE, CREATION_END_DATE, ORDER_NO, ORDER_KEY, DESCRIPTION, NOTES, USE_YN, INSERT_UUID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_UUID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{containerUuid}, #{statusUuid}, #{containerName}, #{containerTypeUuid}, #{controlNumber}, #{provenance}, #{creationStartDate}, #{creationEndDate}, #{orderNo}, #{orderKey}, #{description}, #{notes}, #{useYn}, #{insertUuid}, #{insertDate}, #{updateUuid}, #{updateDate} )
